Package sorcer.core.context

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApplicationDescription  
    ContextAccessor
    The ContextAccessor interface defines storage and retrieval of service contexts.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayContext
    The Array dataContext has an array like access to a service dataContext.
    ComprehensiveContext
    The Comprehensive Context is a data structure designed to enable CDS providers to encapsulate the query for data from multiple EDS providers into a single request.
    ComprehensiveContextIterator  
    ContextLink
    Provides for service context linking.
    ContextManagementAdapter
    Context Management provides methods for managing contexts over the network.
    ContextMetaDataImpl  
    Contexts
    The Contexts class provides utility services to ServiceContext that are required by requestors such as the the SORCER graphical user interface and and any complex SORCER requestor or service provider.
    ContextUtil
    Static fields and methods copied from Contexts.
    ControlContext  
    ListContext<T>
    ServiceContext implementing the java.util.List interface.
    PositionalContext<T>  
    ServiceContext<T>
    Implements the base-level service context interface Context.
    SharedAssociativeContext
    SpaceContext persists its dataContext nodes in a distributed array in JavaSpace with the name provided in the constructor.
    SharedIndexedContext<T>
    ServiceContext implementing the java.util.List interface.
    ThrowableTrace
